metadata.description:
"This is the story of the friendship of two youths and ""Magic Treasures"" that contain the power of the gods. 

In Dread Kingdom a group called the Cobalt Church, who transform people into monsters is causing chaos... 

In the midst of this Kazutoki, a boy from another world who has lost his memory runs into Red, the young king of Dread Kingdom. 

DREAD RED volume 1 is on sale now! You can find it at one of these online stores!"
metadata.name: DREAD RED
